CustomField.description: System field showing the number of Parent Tasks 'up the chain' to the Top-level Parent Task. Top-level Tasks themselves have a Hierarchy Depth of 0, their immediate child Tasks have a Hierarchy Depth of 1, and so on.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: System field showing the number of Parent Tasks 'up the chain' to the Top-level Parent Task. Top-level Tasks themselves have a Hierarchy Depth of 0, their immediate child Tasks have a Hierarchy Depth of 1, and so on.
CustomField.label: Hierarchy Depth
